title: Small Finance Banks have good growth potential in India: Suveer Kumar Gupta, MD & CEO, Shivalik Small Finance Bank. - Elets
content: Small Finance Banks have good growth potential in India: Suveer Kumar Gupta, MD & CEO, Shivalik Small Finance Bank.  Elets
description: The outbreak of Covid-19 and the ongoing challenges associated with the pandemic induced several changes across the industries around the world and the BFSI sector is no different.
